demo.title: Parallel Routes Demo
demo.mountIndicator: The purple timer shows how long each slot has been mounted.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Navigate between routes and watch the header slots. The timer resets = component remounted.

withoutCache.title: Without cacheComponents
withoutCache.description: All parallel route slots remount on every navigation. Even /settings and /profile (same SearchBox component) cause remounts.

withCache.title: With cacheComponents: true
withCache.description: Components don't remount, BUT each route has isolated state. /settings and /profile have separate SearchBox instances — animation resets when switching between them.

homeException.title: The / exception
homeException.description: Uses default.tsx (no dynamic segment) — doesn't trigger remount behavior.

expected.title: Expected Behavior
expected.description: When /settings and /profile both render SearchBox, React should keep it mounted (same component type). Only remount when switching to different content (e.g., /about).
